Title: XXL
Actors: Michel Boujenah, Gérard Depardieu, Elsa Zylberstein
Plot: Alain Berrebi directs with his sister Lorène, a company of ready-to-wear in the Path. Their business is booming to the point to consider acquiring a nearby shop. Fortunately, it belongs to David Stern, the father of his fiancée Ar...
